subject: Dear sir/Madam,
body:
Dear sir/Madam,
This is to bring to your notice with immediate effect to know that your inheritance fund as the next of kin has been over due for immediate payment,
As a matter of fact, there is no atom of risk involved in this your payment exercise. If you are interested to receive this your funds, please indicate by
responding to this email ( 
rasheedmuhammed55@yahoo.com
 )
This new development for you to contact me for your immediate fund release came up as soon as the legal department told us the information they got from the Finance and Security Company for the payment of your fund worth,$3,000,000.00 ( UNITED STATE DOLLARS THREE MILLION DOLLARS ) they said that if you again delay or fail to claim your inheritance fund this time around they will ordered their government to confiscate the fund and transfer it to their escrow account as an unclaimed funds for years,
They said you have limited period of time to claim this your fund worth,$3,000,000.00 ( UNITED STATE DOLLARS THREE MILLION DOLLARS ) therefore hurry up now to claim your fund immediately,
I WAIT FOR YOUR URGENT REPLY.
Yours Sincerely,
Dr Rasheed Muhammed

subject: Re:   Dear sir/Madam,
body:
Dear Dr. Rasheed Muhammed,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the overdue payment of my funds. I appreciate you bringing this matter to my attention.

I must admit, I am a bit surprised by this email. Could you please provide me with more details about the origin of these funds and why they have been held for so long? I want to make sure that everything is legitimate before proceeding further.

Additionally, could you clarify what steps I need to take in order to claim the funds? Are there any fees or charges involved in the process? It would be helpful to have a clear understanding of the requirements and timeline for receiving the funds.

I look forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Pauline

subject: Dear good friend Pauline, I wait for your urgent reply with your personal information
body:
Dear good friend Pauline,
This is to acknowledge the receipt of your email to me and to inform you this very contract fund belong to one of our foreign contractor whom after completing this very huge amount contract worth $3M which he died in an auto crash accident with all his families when they were coming back home from a picnic and since 2015 that he died we have been looking for any of his relative or the next of kin this our late contractor to come and claim his late  relative fund as the legal beneficiary to this very fund but all our efforts were to no avail.

We decided to contact you now so we can do this business confidentially together to claim this fund out by presenting you now as the legal next of kin to benefit this contract fund because the bank want to confiscate the fund because it has been overdue for claim by the relatives of the late contractor. Please be  informed  that this business is 100% risk free so there is nothing to worry about. I  am writing this mail on my behalf and my colleagues involved in this business transactin . 

AFTER MEETINGS WITH MY COLLEAGUES CONCERNING THIS BUSINESS TRANSACTION, WE AGREED  AND  COME TO A CONCLUSION THAT 40% BELONG TO YOU FOR ASSISTING US TO RECEIVE THE FUND WHILE 60% GOES  TO ME AND  MY COLLEAGUES THAT BROUGHT THIS BUSINESS TRANSACTION.


KINDLY SEND TO ME YOUR FOLLOWING INFORMATION:

1, YOUR MOBILE PHONE NUMBER.

2, YOUR RESIDENTIAL ADDRESS.

3. A COPY OF YOUR ID CARD


I wait for your urgent reply with your personal information
Regards,

Dr Rasheed Muhammed

subject: Re: Dear good friend Pauline, I wait for your urgent reply with your personal information
body:
Dear Dr. Rasheed Muhammed,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I'm sorry to hear about the unfortunate accident that led to the death of your contractor and his family. It must have been a difficult time for everyone involved.

I understand that you are looking for a next of kin to claim the late contractor's fund, as the bank is planning to confiscate it due to the lack of relatives coming forward. I'm interested in learning more about how I can assist you in this matter.

Could you please provide me with some additional details? Specifically, I would like to know more about the amount of funds involved and any legal procedures that need to be followed. Additionally, if there are any documents or forms that I need to fill out, please let me know.

I appreciate your assurance that this business is risk-free. However, before proceeding further, I would like to understand how my involvement will benefit both parties involved. Could you please explain how the funds will be divided between yourself, your colleagues, and me?

Once I have all the necessary information, I will be able to make an informed decision regarding my participation in this endeavor.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Pauline

subject: Dear Pauline, I WANT TO KNOW HOW SERIOUS AND SINCERE YOU ARE

subject: Re: Dear Pauline, I WANT TO KNOW HOW SERIOUS AND SINCERE YOU ARE
body:
Dear Dr. Rasheed Muhammed,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I appreciate your trust in me and my willingness to assist you. However, before we proceed further, I have a few questions regarding the details of this business.

1. Could you please provide more information about the nature of this business and how exactly I would be assisting you?

2. What is the total amount of funds that we are talking about here?

3. Can you explain why my personal information, such as my mobile phone number, address, and ID card copy, is required? How will it be used?

I look forward to your prompt response so that we can discuss these matters further.

Best wishes,
Pauline

subject: MY ANSWERS TO YOUR THREE QUESTIONS
body:
Dear good friend Pauline,

Thanks for your urgent reply to my mail and below is the answers to your 3 questions to me:


1. Could you please provide more information about the nature of this business and how exactly I would be assisting you?

Like I told you that I will officially present you to the company lawyer as the legal and authentic next of kin of our late contractor to claim and receive this fund in your bank account on behalf of your late relative, and as an insider I will give you all the necessary information you may need when we get to any stage as we proceed further in this mutual benefit business transaction. Do not fear I am 100% with you.

2. What is the total amount of funds that we are talking about here?
The total amount is $3,000,000.00 (THREE MILLION UNITED STATE OF AMERICA DOLLARS)


3. Can you explain why my personal information, such as my mobile phone number, address, and ID card copy, is required? How will it be used?

Your personal information is seriously needed to identify and recognize you officially and legally as the only authorized next of kin to receive this very fund worth $3M because your information will be submitted to the company lawyer who will authorize and certify you to the bank for immediate payment of the fund into your nominated bank account you will present to the bank for immediate payment.I think you are satisfied with my answers to you now.


So I am now expecting those information from you urgently.
Regards,

Dr. Rasheed Muhammed,

subject: THE SOURCE OF THE FUND IS OIL AND GAS CONTRACT AWARD
body:
Dear Pauline,

Our late client Mr Albert Alezandra Adams was awarded a contract with the Turkish National Petroleum Oil And Gas corporation for the maintenance of the oil and gas refinery facilities and equipment which he has successfully concluded his contract before his auto crash untimely death with his family now we are looking for his next of kin to receive his relative fund which I will present you as the next of kin because I am the director of operation, so as an insider i have all the important information you may need just show me your sincerity and seriousness by giving me your information so we can move forward without further delay.

I will never involve myself in anything that will cause me trouble that is why i want us to conclude this business transaction immediately withing 14 working days because I want to invest my own share for my lovely family future in your country. Again keeping the secret of this business transaction is very important for both of us but you are delaying this business transaction with too much question without furnishing me with your information to forward to the company lawyer for the fund release approval.

Your personal information is only used for legal process of claiming the funds, no third parties will have access to your personal information or used for any other purposes apart from the legal process of claiming the funds? Trust me the same way I am trusting you now because my word is my bond.
Regards,

Dr. Rasheed Muhammed,

subject: Re: THE SOURCE OF THE FUND IS OIL AND GAS CONTRACT AWARD
body:
Dear Dr. Rasheed Muhammed,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the late Mr. Albert Alezandra Adams and his contract with the Turkish National Petroleum Oil And Gas. I'm sorry to hear about his untimely death.

I understand that you are looking for Mr. Adams' next of kin to receive his relative fund, and you believe that I could be a suitable candidate as the director of operations. I appreciate your trust in me, but before we proceed further, I have a few questions.

Firstly, could you please provide more details about the amount of funds involved in this transaction? It would help me understand the scope of this opportunity better.

Secondly, what legal process is required for claiming the funds? Are there any fees or expenses involved? I want to ensure that everything is done properly and legally.

Lastly, can you explain how my personal information will be used solely for the legal process of claiming the funds? I value my privacy and want to make sure that my information will not be misused or shared with any third parties.

Thank you for your understanding, Dr. Muhammed. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Pauline
